com.ephesoft.dcma.ftp.service

Interface FTPService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FTPServiceImpl

    public interface FTPService
    This service is used to Upload/download data to/from an FTP Server.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ephesoft
    See Also:
    FTPServiceImpl

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void downloadDirectory(java.lang.String sourceDirName, java.lang.String destDirectoryPath, int retryCounter, boolean isDeletedFTPServerSourceContent)
      API to download a particular directory from FTP Server.
      void uploadDirectory(java.lang.String sourceDirectoryPath, java.lang.String destDirName, int retryCounter)
      This API uploads a given Source Directory onto the FTP Server.

    • Method Detail

      • uploadDirectory

        void uploadDirectory(java.lang.String sourceDirectoryPath,
                   java.lang.String destDirName,
                   int retryCounter)
                     throws FTPDataUploadException
        This API uploads a given Source Directory onto the FTP Server.
        Parameters:
        sourceDirectoryPath - String - Full Path of the directory to be copied.
        destDirName - String - Name of the directory to be created on FTP Server.
        retryCounter - int - Start with zero.
        Throws:
        FTPDataUploadException - if any exception occur in file uploading.

      • downloadDirectory

        void downloadDirectory(java.lang.String sourceDirName,
                     java.lang.String destDirectoryPath,
                     int retryCounter,
                     boolean isDeletedFTPServerSourceContent)
                       throws FTPDataDownloadException
        API to download a particular directory from FTP Server.
        Parameters:
        sourceDirName - String - Name of the source directory to be copied.
        destDirectoryPath - String - Full path where directory need to be copied.
        retryCounter - int- Start with zero.
        isDeletedFTPServerSourceContent - boolean - set true for deleted the ftp server content.
        Throws:
        FTPDataDownloadException - if any exception occurs in file downloading.
